chat_link.label: Link to the Chat of the Course
chat_link.help_text: The channel for the course has to be created manually in Mattermost before.

ects.label: ECTS
ects.help_text: Only courses with '2,5', '5', or '12,5' (the latter only for degrees) are allowed.

external_registration_link.label: External registration link
external_registration_link.help_text: If the course or event should not be administered via EduHub, enter a link to the external registration here.
